name: Beat viking mama while having exactly 20 lives
Do a zip anywhere but the 3rd screen of bongo hills
in TSoF final screen, go from bottom to top without taking damage and without using helicopter
in PP2, Collect all 60 tings & reach the endsign without taking a hit
Collect 5 cages in twilight gulch without getting hit
Beat Space Mama while having exactly 19 cages
Get all 6 1ups in Eat at Joe's
Kill 6 different tall living stones in PPW without punch and without taking damage in between
Enter Anguish Lagoon for the first time with 13 lives and 5 cages
Get all 7 1ups in Eraser Plains
Beat allegro presto without having the ring grab powerup
In MSS get from the photographer to the end sign while only using 1 punch
Get all cages in EAJ in reverse order
Zip 4 times
Get all cages in anguish lagoon in 1 go without leaving the level
Get all tings in Allegro 1
in PP, Get 7 Unique fist powerups without picking up P orbs
Beat skops 1 without standing on a surface apart from the start and 3 red platforms
Do a superjump in picture city
Beat allegro screen 1 while only collecting 6 tings or less
Kill 50 living stones (small or tall) in 1 screen without getting hit
Get Both MN1 cages without using speed storage
Get the helicopter powerup while having exactly 4 cages in total
Spawn 30 enemies from the lips guy in MN without getting hit
Fully game over
